com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.ui
Class DetailsFromTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.ui.DetailsFromTemplate

public class DetailsFromTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

Handles turning planet details into text using a template

Method Detail

addStatics

protected void addStatics(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
                   throws freemarker.template.TemplateException
Sets up the static and common template objects including static methods of math and constant classes. These are placed into a map for use by the templates.

Parameters:
map - The map to be populated by this method
Throws:
freemarker.template.TemplateException - If there is an error creating the objects

processTemplate

public void processTemplate(freemarker.template.Template template,
                            Planet planet,
                            Primary star,
                            java.io.Writer out)
                     throws freemarker.template.TemplateException,
                            java.io.IOException
Process a template meant to describe one planet

Parameters:
template - The FreeMarker template to be used
planet - The planet object to be described
star - The parent star for the planet
out - The stream where the output is to be written
Throws:
freemarker.template.TemplateException - If there is an error in the template
java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the output

                            Primary star,
                            java.io.Writer out)
                     throws freemarker.template.TemplateException,
                            java.io.IOException
Process a template meant to describe a star

Parameters:
template - The FreeMarker template to be used
star - The parent star for the planet
out - The stream where the output is to be written
Throws:
freemarker.template.TemplateException - If there is an error in the template
java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the output

processTemplate

public void processTemplate(freemarker.template.Template template,
                            java.util.List<Planet> planets,
                            Primary star,
                            java.io.Writer out)
                     throws freemarker.template.TemplateException,
                            java.io.IOException
Process a template meant to describe all the planets in a system

Parameters:
template - The FreeMarker template to be used
planets - The list of planet object to be described
star - The parent star for the planets
out - The stream where the output is to be written
Throws:
freemarker.template.TemplateException - If there is an error in the template
java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the output
